original_title: Reg Reagan - Blood Sweat and Beers
overview: You know what they say 'You can't hold a good man down'. Australia's very own Rugby League icon Reg Reagan is back louder, ruder and funnier than ever. 'Blood Sweat & Beers!' is jam packed with more hilarious moments from one of leagues busiest personalities.
title: Reg Reagan - Blood Sweat and Beers
